Symbol.Script_3D:
! Tankless Water Heater
IF gs_detlevel_3D_m = -1 THEN gs_detlevel_3D_m = 2 ! Detailed IF gs_detlevel_3D = `Откл.` THEN gs_detlevel_3D_m = 0 IF gs_detlevel_3D = `Простой` THEN gs_detlevel_3D_m = 1 ENDIF
IF gs_detlevel_3D_m = 0 THEN END
res = 24 ! Detailed IF gs_detlevel_3D_m = 1 THEN res = 8 ! Simple
IF useSysMat THEN MainBoxMaterial = sMat operatorMaterial = sMat ENDIF MATERIAL MainBoxMaterial
PEN gs_cont_pen RESOL res
DEFINE MATERIAL "Shaft Black Plastic" 20, 0.147059, 0.135294, 0.103922, 0.9, 0.6, 0.2, 0, 10, 0, 1, 0.978103, 0.968383, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 1, 0
! --- WATER HEATER --- !
unID = 1 HOTSPOT -A/2, 0, 0, unID: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT A/2, 0, 0, unID: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT A/2, -B, 0, unID: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT -A/2, -B, 0, unID: unID=unID+1
HOTSPOT -A/2, 0, ZZYZX, unID: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT A/2, 0, ZZYZX, unID: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT A/2, -B, ZZYZX, unID: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT -A/2, -B, ZZYZX, unID: unID=unID+1
IF gs_detlevel_3D_m = 2 THEN ! Detailed ROTx 90 ADDy 0.3 CUTPOLY 4, -0.025,0, -0.025,0.02, 0.025,0.02, 0.025,0 DEL 2 EXTRUDE 6, 0,0,ZZYZX, 1+2+16+32, -A/2, 0, 0, -A/2, -B+cy, 0, -A/2+cx, -B, 0, A/2-cx, -B, 0, A/2, -B+cy, 0, A/2, 0, 0 CUTEND
ROTx 90 POLY 4, -A/2, 0, -A/2, ZZYZX, A/2, ZZYZX, A/2, 0 DEL 1
px = 0.35 * A ADD 0,-B, 0.10 ROTx 90
MATERIAL operatorMaterial IF useSysMat THEN MATERIAL sMat
PRISM_ 10, 0.005, -px, 0, 15, -px, 0.12, 15, px, 0.12, 15, px, 0, 15, px, 0, 79, -px, 0, -1, -0.6*px, 0.06, 900, 0.018,360,4079, 0.6*px, 0.06, 900, 0.018,360,4079
ADD 0,0.06, 0.005 CYLIND 0.005,0.02 ROTz 18 ADD -0.005, -0.02, 0.005 BLOCK 0.01, 0.04,0.01 DEL 3
ADDz 0.002 MATERIAL "Shaft Black Plastic" IF useSysMat THEN MATERIAL sMat
POLY_ 2, -0.6*px, 0.06, 901, 0.018,360,4001 POLY_ 2, 0.6*px, 0.06, 901, 0.018,360,4001
DEL 3 ENDIF
IF gs_detlevel_3D_m = 1 THEN ! Simple PRISM 4, ZZYZX, -A/2, 0, -A/2, -B, A/2, -B, A/2, 0
px = 0.35 * A ADD 0,-B, 0.10 ROTx 90
MATERIAL operatorMaterial IF useSysMat THEN MATERIAL sMat
PRISM 4, 0.005, -px, 0, -px, 0.12, px, 0.12, px, 0 DEL 2 ENDIF
DEL TOP RESOL res
! --- CONNECTIONS --- !
CALL "MEP_m_ConnectionsMEP_4" PARAMETERS SetProgram = SetProgram, ui_current_con = ui_current_con, MEP_NumberConnections = MEP_NumberConnections, MEP_NumConnectionData = gs_Connections, gs_AddConnections = gs_AddConnections, cShow3D = 1, gs_ConMat = MainBoxMaterial, MEP_InsShow = 0, MEP_cline_show_3D = 0, gs_cont_pen = gs_cont_pen, ConPosX_1=ConPosX_1, ConPosY_1=ConPosY_1, ConPosZ_1=ConPosZ_1, ConLength_1=ConLength_1, ConEdit_1 = 15, ConPosX_2=ConPosX_2, ConPosY_2=ConPosY_2, ConPosZ_2=ConPosZ_2, ConLength_2=ConLength_2, ConEdit_2 = 15, ConPosX_3=ConPosX_3, ConPosY_3=ConPosY_3, ConPosZ_3=ConPosZ_3, ConLength_3=ConLength_3, ConEdit_3 = 15, ConPosX_4=ConPosX_4, ConPosY_4=ConPosY_4, ConPosZ_4=ConPosZ_4, ConLength_4=ConLength_4, ConEdit_4 = 15 END
Symbol.Script_2D:
! Tankless Water Heater
PEN gs_cont_pen SET FILL gs_fill_type
unID = 1 DrawingNum = 1 IF DrawingNum = 1 THEN ! Top
! --- WATER HEATER --- !
HOTSPOT2 -A/2, 0, unID: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 A/2, 0, unID: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 A/2, -B, unID: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 -A/2, -B, unID: unID=unID+1
IF GLOB_CONTEXT <> 22 THEN POLY2_B 6, 1+2+4+64, gs_fill_pen, gs_back_pen, -A/2, 0, 1, -A/2, -B+cy, 1, -A/2+cx, -B, 1, A/2-cx, -B, 1, A/2, -B+cy, 1, A/2, 0, 1 ENDIF ENDIF DEL TOP
! --- OTHER VIEWS --- !
ROT2 (SYMB_MIRRORED - NOT(SYMB_MIRRORED)) * (DrawingNum > 1) * SYMB_ROTANGLE
IF DrawingNum = 2 THEN PROJECT2 -3, 90, 2 ! Bottom IF DrawingNum = 3 THEN PROJECT2 4, 270, 2 ! Front IF DrawingNum = 4 THEN PROJECT2 4, 90, 2 ! Back IF DrawingNum = 5 THEN PROJECT2 4, 180 * SYMB_MIRRORED, 2 ! Right IF DrawingNum = 6 THEN PROJECT2 4, 180 * NOT(SYMB_MIRRORED), 2 ! Left
! --- CONNECTIONS --- !
CALL "MEP_m_ConnectionsMEP_4" PARAMETERS SetProgram = SetProgram, ui_current_con = ui_current_con, MEP_NumberConnections = MEP_NumberConnections, MEP_NumConnectionData = gs_Connections, gs_AddConnections = gs_AddConnections, DrawingNum = DrawingNum, MEP_InsShow = 0, MEP_cline_show = 0, gs_cont_pen = gs_cont_pen, gs_fill_type=gs_fill_type, gs_fill_pen=gs_fill_pen, gs_back_pen=gs_back_pen, ConPosX_1=ConPosX_1, ConPosY_1=ConPosY_1, ConLength_1=ConLength_1, ConEdit_1 = 5, ConPosX_2=ConPosX_2, ConPosY_2=ConPosY_2, ConLength_2=ConLength_2, ConEdit_2 = 5, ConPosX_3=ConPosX_3, ConPosY_3=ConPosY_3, ConLength_3=ConLength_3, ConEdit_3 = 5, ConPosX_4=ConPosX_4, ConPosY_4=ConPosY_4, ConLength_4=ConLength_4, ConEdit_4 = 5 DEL 1
END
Symbol.Script_1D:
! Tankless Water Heater
EPS = 0.0001
! --- HARDCODED AND DERIVED VARIABLES --- !
cx = 0.040 cy = 0.015
z = 0
PARAMETERS ac_toplevel = z PARAMETERS ac_bottomlevel = z
Symbol.Script_UI:
! Tankless Water Heater
UI_DIALOG `Специальные Параметры MEP`
DIM ui_vis_str[2][2] ui_vis_str[1][1] = `Корпус` ui_vis_str[2][1] = `Панель Управления` ui_vis_str[1][2] = "MainBoxMaterial" ui_vis_str[2][2] = "operatorMaterial"
DIM ui_vis_attr[5][4] FOR i = 1 TO 5 FOR j = 1 TO 4 ui_vis_attr[i][j] = 0 NEXT j NEXT i ui_vis_attr[1][1] = 3 ui_vis_attr[1][2] = 1 ui_vis_attr[1][3] = 0 ui_vis_attr[1][4] = 0
ui_vis_attr[2][1] = 1 ui_vis_attr[2][2] = 237 ui_vis_attr[2][3] = 68 ui_vis_attr[2][4] = 14
DIM ui_con_type[4] ui_con_type[1] = 0 ui_con_type[2] = 0 ui_con_type[3] = 0 ui_con_type[4] = 0
CALL "MEP_m_ConnectionsMEP_4" PARAMETERS ALL ui_vis_str = ui_vis_str, ui_vis_attr = ui_vis_attr, ui_con_type = ui_con_type, ui_centerline_vars = 0, ui_system_var_pos = 2, bUIConnectionStatusCheckbox = 1
Symbol.Script_VL:
! Tankless Water Heater
call "FM_types_MEP" parameters DIM shape_typ_to_validation[3] shape_typ_to_validation[1] = 0 ! Rectangle shape_typ_to_validation[2] = 1 ! Circle shape_typ_to_validation[3] = 0 ! Oval
IF GLOB_MODPAR_NAME = "gs_detlevel_3D" OR gs_detlevel_3D_m = -1 THEN gs_detlevel_3D_m = 2 ! Detailed IF gs_detlevel_3D = `Откл.` THEN gs_detlevel_3D_m = 0 IF gs_detlevel_3D = `Простой` THEN gs_detlevel_3D_m = 1 PARAMETERS gs_detlevel_3D_m = gs_detlevel_3D_m ELSE IF gs_detlevel_3D_m = 0 THEN gs_detlevel_3D = `Откл.` IF gs_detlevel_3D_m = 1 THEN gs_detlevel_3D = `Простой` IF gs_detlevel_3D_m = 2 THEN gs_detlevel_3D = `Детальный` PARAMETERS gs_detlevel_3D = gs_detlevel_3D ENDIF
VALUES "gs_detlevel_3D" `Детальный`,`Простой`,`Откл.` VALUES "gs_detlevel_3D_m" 2, 1, 0
! --- MAIN PARAMETERS --- !
IF NOT(SetProgram) THEN minW = 0.20 IF A<minW THEN A=minW PARAMETERS A=minW ENDIF VALUES "A" RANGE [minW,]
minD = 0.20 IF B<minD THEN B=minD PARAMETERS B=minD ENDIF VALUES "B" RANGE [minD,]
minH = 0.35 IF ZZYZX<minH THEN ZZYZX=minH PARAMETERS ZZYZX=minH ENDIF VALUES "ZZYZX" RANGE [minH,] ENDIF
! --- OBJECT SPECIFIC PARAMETERS --- !
IF NOT(SetProgram) THEN minX = -A/2+ConWidth_1/2 maxX = A/2-ConWidth_1/2 minY = -B+ConWidth_1/2 maxY = -ConWidth_1/2 VALUES "ConPosX_1" RANGE [minX, maxX] VALUES "ConPosY_1" RANGE [minY, maxY] IF ConPosX_1<minX THEN ConPosX_1=minX PARAMETERS ConPosX_1=minX ENDIF IF ConPosX_1>maxX THEN ConPosX_1=maxX PARAMETERS ConPosX_1=maxX ENDIF IF ConPosY_1<minY THEN ConPosY_1=minY PARAMETERS ConPosY_1=minY ENDIF IF ConPosY_1>maxY THEN ConPosY_1=maxY PARAMETERS ConPosY_1=maxY ENDIF
minX = -A/2+ConWidth_2/2 maxX = A/2-ConWidth_2/2 minY = -B+ConWidth_2/2 maxY = -ConWidth_2/2 VALUES "ConPosX_2" RANGE [minX, maxX] VALUES "ConPosY_2" RANGE [minY, maxY] IF ConPosX_2<minX THEN ConPosX_2=minX PARAMETERS ConPosX_2=minX ENDIF IF ConPosX_2>maxX THEN ConPosX_2=maxX PARAMETERS ConPosX_2=maxX ENDIF IF ConPosY_2<minY THEN ConPosY_2=minY PARAMETERS ConPosY_2=minY ENDIF IF ConPosY_2>maxY THEN ConPosY_2=maxY PARAMETERS ConPosY_2=maxY ENDIF
minX = -A/2+ConWidth_3/2 maxX = A/2-ConWidth_3/2 minY = -B+ConWidth_3/2 maxY = -ConWidth_3/2 VALUES "ConPosX_3" RANGE [minX, maxX] VALUES "ConPosY_3" RANGE [minY, maxY] IF ConPosX_3<minX THEN ConPosX_3=minX PARAMETERS ConPosX_3=minX ENDIF IF ConPosX_3>maxX THEN ConPosX_3=maxX PARAMETERS ConPosX_3=maxX ENDIF IF ConPosY_3<minY THEN ConPosY_3=minY PARAMETERS ConPosY_3=minY ENDIF IF ConPosY_3>maxY THEN ConPosY_3=maxY PARAMETERS ConPosY_3=maxY ENDIF
minX = -A/2+ConWidth_4/2 maxX = A/2-ConWidth_4/2 minY = -B+ConWidth_4/2 maxY = -ConWidth_4/2 VALUES "ConPosX_4" RANGE [minX, maxX] VALUES "ConPosY_4" RANGE [minY, maxY] IF ConPosX_4<minX THEN ConPosX_4=minX PARAMETERS ConPosX_4=minX ENDIF IF ConPosX_4>maxX THEN ConPosX_4=maxX PARAMETERS ConPosX_4=maxX ENDIF IF ConPosY_4<minY THEN ConPosY_4=minY PARAMETERS ConPosY_4=minY ENDIF IF ConPosY_4>maxY THEN ConPosY_4=maxY PARAMETERS ConPosY_4=maxY ENDIF ENDIF
! --- CONNECTIONS --- !
PARAMETERS MEP_NumberConnections = 4
! --- COLD WATER CONNECTION --- !
ConID = 1 ConName = `Соединение Трубы - Холодная Вода`
ConDVecX = 0 ConDVecY = 0 ConDVecZ = -1
ConWVecX = -1 ConWVecY = 0 ConWVecZ = 0
IF NOT(SetProgram) THEN maxCW = MIN(A, B) / 5
VALUES "ConLength_1" RANGE [0,] VALUES "ConWidth_1" RANGE (0, maxCW] VALUES "ConDepth_1" RANGE (0, maxCW]
IF ConWidth_1<EPS THEN ConWidth_1=EPS PARAMETERS ConWidth_1=EPS ENDIF IF ConWidth_1>maxCW THEN ConWidth_1=maxCW PARAMETERS ConWidth_1=maxCW ENDIF PARAMETERS ConPosZ_1 = 0
VALUES "ConWallThickness_1" RANGE [0, ConWidth_1/2] ENDIF
CALL "MEP_m_ConnectionsMEP_4" PARAMETERS SetProgram = SetProgram, gs_Connections = gs_Connections, MEP_NumConnectionData = MEP_NumConnectionData, MEP_StrConnectionData = MEP_StrConnectionData, MEP_NumberConnections = MEP_NumberConnections, gs_AddConnections = gs_AddConnections, ConName = ConName, ConID = ConID, ConPosX = ConPosX_1, ConPosY = ConPosY_1, ConPosZ = ConPosZ_1, ConDVecX = ConDVecX, ConDVecY = ConDVecY, ConDVecZ = ConDVecZ, ConWVecX = ConWVecX, ConWVecY = ConWVecY, ConWVecZ = ConWVecZ,
ConNominalWidth = ConNominalWidth_1, ConNominalDepth = ConNominalDepth_1, ConWidth = ConWidth_1, ConDepth = ConDepth_1, ConLength = ConLength_1, ConWallThickness = ConWallThickness_1, ConConnectorWidth = ConConnectorWidth_1, ConConnectorDepth = ConConnectorDepth_1, ConConnectorWidth2 = ConConnectorWidth2_1, ConToolType = ConToolType_1, ConStatus = ConStatus_1, ConType_1 = ConType_1, ConConnectorType_1 = ConConnectorType_1, ConSystem_1 = ConSystem_1, ui_page_idx = ui_page_idx, ui_current_con = ui_current_con, shape_typ_to_validation = shape_typ_to_validation, MEP_enabled_geometry_mod = 1, bUIConnectionStatusCheckbox = 1
PARAMETERS MEP_ConInfo[ConID][1] = STR(ConToolType_1, 1, 0) PARAMETERS MEP_ConInfo[ConID][2] = ConName PARAMETERS MEP_ConInfo[ConID][3] = "0"
! --- HOT WATER CONNECTION --- !
ConID = 2 ConName = `Соединение Трубы - Горячая Вода`
ConDVecX = 0 ConDVecY = 0 ConDVecZ = -1
ConWVecX = -1 ConWVecY = 0 ConWVecZ = 0
IF NOT(SetProgram) THEN maxCW = MIN(A, B) / 5
VALUES "ConLength_2" RANGE [0,] VALUES "ConWidth_2" RANGE (0, maxCW] VALUES "ConDepth_2" RANGE (0, maxCW]
IF ConWidth_2<EPS THEN ConWidth_2=EPS PARAMETERS ConWidth_2=EPS ENDIF IF ConWidth_2>maxCW THEN ConWidth_2=maxCW PARAMETERS ConWidth_2=maxCW ENDIF PARAMETERS ConPosZ_2 = 0
VALUES "ConWallThickness_2" RANGE [0, ConWidth_2/2] ENDIF
CALL "MEP_m_ConnectionsMEP_4" PARAMETERS SetProgram = SetProgram, gs_Connections = gs_Connections, MEP_NumConnectionData = MEP_NumConnectionData, MEP_StrConnectionData = MEP_StrConnectionData, MEP_NumberConnections = MEP_NumberConnections, gs_AddConnections = gs_AddConnections, ConName = ConName, ConID = ConID, ConPosX = ConPosX_2, ConPosY = ConPosY_2, ConPosZ = ConPosZ_2, ConDVecX = ConDVecX, ConDVecY = ConDVecY, ConDVecZ = ConDVecZ, ConWVecX = ConWVecX, ConWVecY = ConWVecY, ConWVecZ = ConWVecZ,
ConNominalWidth = ConNominalWidth_2, ConNominalDepth = ConNominalDepth_2, ConWidth = ConWidth_2, ConDepth = ConDepth_2, ConLength = ConLength_2, ConWallThickness = ConWallThickness_2, ConConnectorWidth = ConConnectorWidth_2, ConConnectorDepth = ConConnectorDepth_2, ConConnectorWidth2 = ConConnectorWidth2_2, ConToolType = ConToolType_2, ConStatus = ConStatus_2, ConType_2 = ConType_2, ConConnectorType_2 = ConConnectorType_2, ConSystem_2 = ConSystem_2, shape_typ_to_validation = shape_typ_to_validation, MEP_enabled_geometry_mod = 1, bUIConnectionStatusCheckbox = 1
PARAMETERS MEP_ConInfo[ConID][1] = STR(ConToolType_2, 1, 0) PARAMETERS MEP_ConInfo[ConID][2] = ConName PARAMETERS MEP_ConInfo[ConID][3] = "0"
! --- GAS CONNECTION --- !
ConID = 3 ConName = `Соединение Трубы - Газ`
ConDVecX = 0 ConDVecY = 0 ConDVecZ = -1
ConWVecX = -1 ConWVecY = 0 ConWVecZ = 0
IF NOT(SetProgram) THEN maxCW = MIN(A, B) / 5
VALUES "ConLength_3" RANGE [0,] VALUES "ConWidth_3" RANGE (0, maxCW] VALUES "ConDepth_3" RANGE (0, maxCW]
IF ConWidth_3<EPS THEN ConWidth_3=EPS PARAMETERS ConWidth_3=EPS ENDIF IF ConWidth_3>maxCW THEN ConWidth_3=maxCW PARAMETERS ConWidth_3=maxCW ENDIF PARAMETERS ConPosZ_3 = 0
VALUES "ConWallThickness_3" RANGE [0, ConWidth_3/2] ENDIF
CALL "MEP_m_ConnectionsMEP_4" PARAMETERS SetProgram = SetProgram, gs_Connections = gs_Connections, MEP_NumConnectionData = MEP_NumConnectionData, MEP_StrConnectionData = MEP_StrConnectionData, MEP_NumberConnections = MEP_NumberConnections, gs_AddConnections = gs_AddConnections, ConName = ConName, ConID = ConID, ConPosX = ConPosX_3, ConPosY = ConPosY_3, ConPosZ = ConPosZ_3, ConDVecX = ConDVecX, ConDVecY = ConDVecY, ConDVecZ = ConDVecZ, ConWVecX = ConWVecX, ConWVecY = ConWVecY, ConWVecZ = ConWVecZ,
ConNominalWidth = ConNominalWidth_3, ConNominalDepth = ConNominalDepth_3, ConWidth = ConWidth_3, ConDepth = ConDepth_3, ConLength = ConLength_3, ConWallThickness = ConWallThickness_3, ConConnectorWidth = ConConnectorWidth_3, ConConnectorDepth = ConConnectorDepth_3, ConConnectorWidth2 = ConConnectorWidth2_3, ConToolType = ConToolType_3, ConStatus = ConStatus_3, ConType_3 = ConType_3, ConConnectorType_3 = ConConnectorType_3, ConSystem_3 = ConSystem_3, shape_typ_to_validation = shape_typ_to_validation, MEP_enabled_geometry_mod = 1, bUIConnectionStatusCheckbox = 1
PARAMETERS MEP_ConInfo[ConID][1] = STR(ConToolType_3, 1, 0) PARAMETERS MEP_ConInfo[ConID][2] = ConName PARAMETERS MEP_ConInfo[ConID][3] = "0"
! --- SMOKE CONNECTION --- !
ConID = 4 ConName = `Подключение Дымохода`
ConDVecX = 0 ConDVecY = 0 ConDVecZ = 1
ConWVecX = 1 ConWVecY = 0 ConWVecZ = 0
IF NOT(SetProgram) THEN maxCW = MIN(A, B) / 3
VALUES "ConLength_4" RANGE [0,] VALUES "ConWidth_4" RANGE (0, maxCW] VALUES "ConDepth_4" RANGE (0, maxCW]
IF ConWidth_4<EPS THEN ConWidth_4=EPS PARAMETERS ConWidth_4=EPS ENDIF IF ConWidth_4>maxCW THEN ConWidth_4=maxCW PARAMETERS ConWidth_4=maxCW ENDIF PARAMETERS ConPosZ_4 = ZZYZX
VALUES "ConWallThickness_4" RANGE [0, ConWidth_4/2] ENDIF
CALL "MEP_m_ConnectionsMEP_4" PARAMETERS SetProgram = SetProgram, gs_Connections = gs_Connections, MEP_NumConnectionData = MEP_NumConnectionData, MEP_StrConnectionData = MEP_StrConnectionData, MEP_NumberConnections = MEP_NumberConnections, gs_AddConnections = gs_AddConnections, ConName = ConName, ConID = ConID, ConPosX = ConPosX_4, ConPosY = ConPosY_4, ConPosZ = ConPosZ_4, ConDVecX = ConDVecX, ConDVecY = ConDVecY, ConDVecZ = ConDVecZ, ConWVecX = ConWVecX, ConWVecY = ConWVecY, ConWVecZ = ConWVecZ,
ConNominalWidth = ConNominalWidth_4, ConNominalDepth = ConNominalDepth_4, ConWidth = ConWidth_4, ConDepth = ConDepth_4, ConLength = ConLength_4, ConWallThickness = ConWallThickness_4, ConConnectorWidth = ConConnectorWidth_4, ConConnectorDepth = ConConnectorDepth_4, ConConnectorWidth2 = ConConnectorWidth2_4, ConToolType = ConToolType_4, ConStatus = ConStatus_4, ConType_4 = ConType_4, ConConnectorType_4 = ConConnectorType_4, ConSystem_4 = ConSystem_4, shape_typ_to_validation = shape_typ_to_validation, MEP_enabled_geometry_mod = 1, bUIConnectionStatusCheckbox = 1
PARAMETERS MEP_ConInfo[ConID][1] = STR(ConToolType_4, 1, 0) PARAMETERS MEP_ConInfo[ConID][2] = ConName PARAMETERS MEP_ConInfo[ConID][3] = "0"
IF setProgram THEN SetProgram = 0 PARAMETERS SetProgram = SetProgram ENDIF
values "FM_HeatOutput_unit" `З`, `БТЕ/час` values "FM_RefrigeratingOutput_unit" `З`, `БТЕ/час`
if FM_HeatOutput_unit = `БТЕ/час` then hideparameter "FM_HeatOutput" else hideparameter "FM_HeatOutput_btu" endif
if FM_RefrigeratingOutput_unit = `БТЕ/час` then hideparameter "FM_RefrigeratingOutput" else hideparameter "FM_RefrigeratingOutput_btu" endif
!1000 W = 3414,426 Btu/hour if GLOB_MODPAR_NAME = "FM_HeatOutput_btu" then FM_HeatOutput = FM_HeatOutput_btu / 3.414426 parameters FM_HeatOutput = FM_HeatOutput else FM_HeatOutput_btu = FM_HeatOutput * 3.414426 parameters FM_HeatOutput_btu = FM_HeatOutput_btu endif
!1000 W = 3414,426 Btu/hour if GLOB_MODPAR_NAME = "FM_RefrigeratingOutput_btu" then FM_RefrigeratingOutput = FM_RefrigeratingOutput_btu / 3.414426 parameters FM_RefrigeratingOutput = FM_RefrigeratingOutput else FM_RefrigeratingOutput_btu = FM_RefrigeratingOutput * 3.414426 parameters FM_RefrigeratingOutput_btu = FM_RefrigeratingOutput_btu endif
